00014 #ifndef POINTERFIFOTEMPLATE_H
00015 #define POINTERFIFOTEMPLATE_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 
00019 #include "ISABThread.h"
00020 #include "SelectableSelector.h"
00021 
00022 #include <queue>
00023 #include <vector>
00024 
00032 template<class ElementT, typename Notifier = SelectableSelector> 
00033 class PointerFifoTemplate: private queue<ElementT*> {
00034 public:
00035    
00036    typedef typename queue<ElementT*>::size_type SizeType;
00037    typedef ElementT* value_type;
00038 
00045    PointerFifoTemplate(Notifier* selector = NULL) {
00046       m_wakeUp     = false;
00047       m_terminated = false;
00048       m_selector = selector;
00049    }
00050    
00054    virtual ~PointerFifoTemplate() {
00055       ISABSync synchronized(m_monitor);
00056       // Delete the contents of the queue.
00057       while ( !queue<ElementT*>::empty() ) {
00058          ElementT* element = queue<ElementT*>::front();
00059          delete element;
00060          queue<ElementT*>::pop();
00061       }
00062    }
00063 
00068    void setSelectNotify(Notifier* selector) {
00069       ISABSync synchronized(m_monitor);
00070       m_selector = selector;
00071    }
00072    
00077    SizeType getSize() const {
00078       return queue<ElementT*>::size();
00079    }
00080    
00087    bool enqueue(ElementT* p) {
00088       // Make sure no one else is changing the list
00089       ISABSync synchronized(m_monitor);
00090       
00091       // Insert the packet into the queue if not NULL
00092       if (p != NULL) {
00093          queue<ElementT*>::push(p);
00094          m_monitor.notifyAll();
00095          if ( m_selector != NULL ) {
00096             m_selector->notify();
00097          }
00098          return true;
00099       } else {
00100          // NULL means that we should not wait for long now.
00101          m_wakeUp = true;         
00102          m_monitor.notifyAll();
00103          if ( m_selector != NULL ) {
00104             m_selector->notify();
00105          }
00106          return false;
00107       }
00108    }
00109       
00120    ElementT* dequeue(uint32 maxWaitTime) {
00121       // Make sure no one else is changing the list
00122       ISABSync synchronized(m_monitor);
00123       
00124       if (!m_wakeUp && queue<ElementT*>::empty() && !m_terminated) {
00125          try {
00126             if ( maxWaitTime != MAX_UINT32 ) {
00127                m_monitor.wait(maxWaitTime);
00128             } else {
00129                m_monitor.wait();
00130             }
00131          } catch ( const JTCInterruptedException & ) {
00132             mc2log << warn 
00133                    << "PointerFifoTemp::dequeue wait( int ) interrupted!"
00134                    << endl;
00135          }
00136       }
00137       
00138       if ( m_wakeUp ) {
00139          m_wakeUp = false;
00140       }
00141    
00142       // If we have a packet to return, we return it here
00143       if (!queue<ElementT*>::empty() && !m_terminated) {
00144          ElementT* p = queue<ElementT*>::front();
00145          queue<ElementT*>::pop();
00146          return p;
00147       } else {
00148          return NULL;
00149       }
00150    }
00151 
00158    ElementT* dequeue() {
00159       return dequeue(MAX_UINT32);
00160    }
00161 
00168    ElementT* dequeueNonBlocking() {
00169       ISABSync synchronized(m_monitor);
00170       if ( !queue<ElementT*>::empty() ) {
00171          ElementT* p = queue<ElementT*>::front();
00172          queue<ElementT*>::pop(); return p;         
00173       } else {
00174          return NULL;
00175       }
00176    }
00177    
00178    void dequeue( vector<ElementT*>& elements ) {
00179       ISABSync sync( m_monitor );
00180       SizeType size = queue<ElementT*>::size();
00181       elements.resize( size );
00182       for (SizeType i = 0; i < size; ++i ) {
00183          elements[ i ] = queue<ElementT*>::front();
00184          queue<ElementT*>::pop();
00185       }
00186    }
00191    void terminate() {
00192       ISABSync synchronized(m_monitor);
00193       m_terminated = true;
00194       m_monitor.notifyAll();
00195    }
00196    
00197 private:
00201    ISABMonitor m_monitor;
00202    
00206    bool m_terminated;
00207    
00211    bool m_wakeUp;
00212 
00216    Notifier* m_selector;
00217    
00222    PointerFifoTemplate(const PointerFifoTemplate& rhs);
00223 
00224 };
00225 
00226 #endif
